circumstances: Coming from Miami, Florida, the crew elected to land by night in an open field located in Chimichagua. On final, the twin engine airplane struck the ground and crashed in flames. The aircraft was destroyed and all three occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Improper in-flight decisions on part of the crew. The following factors were reported:
- Improper level off, 
- Failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Inadequate supervision of flight crew, 
- No flight plan filed, 
- Failed to report while entering Colombian airspace, 
- Landed off airport.
